text: Manohar Singh Gill (born 14 June 1936) is an Indian politician. He is a member of the Indian National Congress party. He was the Minister of Youth Affairs and Sports. He represents Punjab in the Rajya Sabha, the upper house of the Indian Parliament. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Indian National Congress politicians Category:Politicians from Punjab, India Category:Members of the Rajya Sabha
title: M. S. Gill
